title: A multiple line graph titled "Immigration to th...

content.question: Which of the following best accounts for the curve on the graph above depicting immigration to the United States from Asia, Africa and the Americas between 1882 and 1900?

choices.label: Rapid expansion of the British Empire into the Southern Hemisphere
Immigration to less-settled areas of the world
Reduction of potential immigrant populations by widespread epidemics

topic.text: 6.8: Immigration and Migration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
